subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Andy Bean birdied the final hole to take a one-shot lead over Mike Goodes heading into the final round of the Regions Charity Classic, a Champions Tour event in Hoover, Ala. Loren Roberts and Denis Watson each shot 66 and were two behind.
